formulas.name: customNotificationbody
formulas.expression: "Project: " & {!ProjectName} & BR() & "File: " & {!FileName} & BR() & BR() & "Document Message:" & BR() & {!Document_Message} & BR() & "Check in Comments: " & BR() & {!Comments} & BR() & "Document LInk: " & BR() & {!$Label.SalesforceURL}&"/"&{!DocumentId}
